attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement to make all employers give workers 20 days holiday per year over and above the bank holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Employers are taking bank holidays off our legal 20 days holiday. meaning that we only get about 12 days holiday to book off for the rest of the year! 20 DAYS HOLIDAY ARE LEGALLY OURS AS WELL AS BANK HOLIDAYS!
